name: Sliming Away
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

You are a slime.

You need to get BIGGER.

The game is simple, collect green slimes to become larger and stronger, and avoid red slimes that shrink you and make you smaller and weaker.

There are some other tough enemies out there, so be on the lookout.

CREDITS:

Lead (and only) developer: U1timateJ7

Lead artist: paper mushe

Creative Consultant (not really. they just helped me with some ideas): Alextimus9
